plot outline: In the village Chintalapudi, Bala koteswarao, an easy going, careless attitude guy falls in love with a college girl, Parvati. The love story of the duo continues in an entertaining and amusing manner with extraordinary intimacy between them when suddenly unexpected things start to come in their way. With mind blowing twists and turns, the story revolves around how some of the crucial circumstances change Koteswarao's life and how he spends the rest of his life with his lady love.
title: Natakam
